titleInfo.title: M²VAE - Derivation of a Multi-Modal Variational Autoencoder Objective from the Marginal Joint Log-Likelihood

mods.abstract: This work gives an in-depth derivation of the trainable evidence lower bound obtained from the marginal joint log-Likelihood with the goal of training a Multi-Modal Variational Autoencoder (M$^2$VAE).
Appendix for the IEEE FUSION 2019 submission on multi-modal variational Autoencoders for sensor fusion
